## **Biography**

Franklin Santos is a Master's student in Plant Sciences at the Austral University of Chile. He is currently part of the GEM (Genotype by Environment by Management) research team, led by the distinguished scientist `Daniela Bustos`. His research focuses on flowering time modeling and prediction to adapt crops to emerging climate challenges.
